name: Last Camping
description:
Warning: The maker is a Unity beginner. This is a manual work. There may be unpredictable errors (it should not be too big a problem)

In the game, you will play an ordinary company employee. The busy work makes you breathless. Fortunately, tomorrow is the rest day. At this time, your friend got a travel poster from a stranger. He is going to invite you and other colleagues to go to the place named "Ebony Forest" on the poster. Is this really a good idea? Will you accept his invitation?

the game has three endings。

tips：Follow the road

警告：制作者是个Unity初学者，这是一部练手作品，可能存在无法预知的错误（应该没有太大问题）

在游戏中你将扮演一名普通的公司职员，繁忙的工作让你喘不过气，好在明天就是休息日，恰巧此时，你的朋友从陌生人手上得到了一张旅行海报，他准备邀请你和其他同事们一起前往海报上所标注的名为“乌木森林”的地方，这真的是个好主意吗？你会接受他的邀请吗？

游戏共有三个结局

提示：顺着路走
